disciplines.barreDetailText: Strength, control and endurance found in an intense, precise and addictive practice

Burn, tone and

disciplines.pilatesDetailSubtitle: CONNECT WITH YOUR CORE, STRENGTHEN YOUR BODY
disciplines.pilatesDetailText: The Pilates method focuses on developing internal muscles to maintain body balance and give stability and firmness to the spine.
disciplines.functionalDetailText: Functional training prepares your body for daily activities, improving strength, endurance, coordination, and agility.
disciplines.functionalProgram1Text: Burn, tone, and exceed your limits
disciplines.functionalProgram4Text: Focused on glutes, abs, and legs
disciplines.functionalProgram5Text: Dynamic stations for a complete workout
disciplines.yogaDetailText: Yoga is a physical, mental, and spiritual practice that connects the body, breath, and mind.
disciplines.yogaProgram2Text: Flow with your breath and connect with your body

ctaSection.text: MOVE BETTER STARTS BY CHOOSING WHERE

faqs.title: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
faqs.q1: WHAT DO I NEED TO BRING TO MY FIRST CLASS?
faqs.a1: We recommend bringing comfortable sportswear, a water bottle, and a small towel. We provide all necessary equipment for the classes, including mats.
faqs.a2: Not at all! Our classes are designed to adapt to all levels. Our instructors will guide you and offer modifications according to your needs.
faqs.q3: CAN I CANCEL OR CHANGE MY BOOKING?
faqs.a3: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your class up to 12 hours before the start of the session through your account or the app.
faqs.a4: Yes, we offer individual private sessions and small group sessions. Contact us for more information on rates and availability.
faqs.q5: DO YOU HAVE CHANGING ROOMS AND SHOWERS?
faqs.a5: Yes, we have full changing rooms with showers and lockers so you can change comfortably before and after your practice.
